task_definition_name: Update Events On Mifos Calendar for Social Entrepreneurship Events
description: This task involves updating our current calendar with the dates/times for events that we’ve participated in the past as well as researching and adding new events. It centers around HFOSS-related events such as OSCON, ApacheCon, etc. Update appropriate section of this sheet ( https://goo.gl/gPqHhj )
